channel.title: Pages on Starting up | Central America

item.description:
Edwin Urquilla

About me

Salvadorean engineer, project leader, architect and developer.
Avid autodidact striving to push forward a pragmatic change in the industry. Looking to never stop traveling and always making a difference. Currently enjoying work and challenges at Midő sv

Experience

Midō International

Technical Lead And CTO

Interviewed and introduced new members of the technical team. Architect and develop solutions for government and financial entities, as well for diverse enterprises with technological needs. Managed and develop projects using Devops technics with tools like Docker, Vagrant and Git. Mentored team members in technologies like JavaEE, Ruby on Rails, Cordova, Angular.js and Scala. Deploy applications to production infrastructure.

Freelance Developer

Freelance as a ( Web | Mobile ) Developer

Developed projects from games to IVR systems with focus on e-commerce sites. Used technologies like Asterisk, CoronaSDK, Ruby on Rails and Android SDK.

Manuel Solís Law Firm

Web Developer

Developed modules for a web application to control enterprise resources like clients, cases and information from operators, assistants and supervisors.

Quirks

  • Amateur salsa dancer
  • Professional beer lover
  • Avid non-standard traveler
